title: A$AP Rocky – “Phoenix” Video (Feat. Michael K. Williams)
text: The Number Ones We've Got A File On You Album Of The Week 10 Best Songs ASAP Rocky - "Phoenix" video ASAP Rocky - "Phoenix" video Michael K. Williams played Omar on The Wire, which will always make him one of the greatest human beings on the planet. He last appeared on Stereogum as the star of MGMT’s vivid and surreal “Cool Song No. 2” clip. Now, he’s added another music video to his resume. He and model Joan Smalls play two halves of a very unhappy couple in A$AP Rocky’s video for the moody Long.Live.A$AP track “Phoenix.” Francesco Carrozzini directed the video, which he wrote with Asia Argento. Watch it at Miss Info. Long.Live.A$AP is out now on RCA. Lil Yachty’s Vancouver Show Cut Short After He Encourages Crowd To Fill Up The Pit The Number Ones: LMFAO’s “Party Rock Anthem” (Feat.
